title: Chinese Authorities Ensure Tiananmen Anniversary Passes Quietly
teaser: Twenty-five years ago, Chinese soldiers backed by tanks cracked down on protesters, shooting hundreds and possibly thousands of unarmed civilians in Beijing's Tiananmen Square. The Chinese mourned victims in private Wednesday, as Tiananmen Square evinced a heavy security presence.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
